name: sling bag
description: (was $98.00) Featherweight city companion, this hands-free bag worn across the body is virtually forgotten, but won't go entirely unnoticed. Thoughtful details like an invisible zipper pocket on front for quick access to wallet and keys without taking it off. Can expand to fit most anything, but is practically weightless alone. In water-resistant vinyl with cotton lining. Similar to a waxed cotton, fabric will abrade at seams and strap with wear to a lovely violet color, unique to each user (for photo click here). Wipe clean with damp towel. Do not launder.

name: vee dress
description:
(was $138.00)

This is a black dress with details that set it apart.  Inverted triangle-shape is wide at shoulder, narrow at hem, with dolman sleeve and cuff just above elbow.  Deep vee neckline with halter bias strap reveal detail.  Extremely soft and drapey Tencel fabric is comparable in feel to sandwashed silk, but is also wrinkle-resistant and breathable.  Refer to faq (link at sidebar) for sizing questions. 

In black twill Tencel (a manufactured natural fiber made from wood pulp.  It is biodegradeable and manufactured with non-polluting chemicals).  Machine wash cold.  Dry on low.

name: shutter tank
description:
(was $118.00)

This easy fit tank was designed to showcase a unique find - the special "shutter" fabric with 1/4" pleats woven right in, lending it a lovely heft and drape.  Racer back and scoop neck starts small at the top and widens to a triangle, draping gracefully around the body.  Horizontal extensions at sides add an extra flounce of movement and are accented with black silk binding along the slit edge.  Refer to faq (link at sidebar) for sizing questions. 

In pleated silk with photographic print.  Half-lined in silk charmeuse with contrast silk binding at edges.  Dry clean.

name: greek vee
description:
(was $98.00)

Simple but special.  Made without sideseams, front and back draping meet at neck, elegantly opening at the shoulder, and are sewn in place with one continuous strip of bias binding.  Low vee neckline balances the volume for a flattering line, while the small-scale stripe adds an unexpected punch of color without overwhelming.  Refer to faq (link at sidebar) for sizing questions. 

In variegated yellow and black yarn-dyed cotton.  Bias binding at neck and hem.  Machine wash on cold.
